title.narrative: UNIDO Investment and Technology Promotion Office in Seoul, Republic of Korea (2017-2019)

description.narrative: The project aims to contribute to the inclusive and sustainable industrial development and economic growth of developing countries and countries with economies in transition by identifying and mobilizing technical, fiancial, managerial and other resources from Korea for the implementation of industrial investment and technology partnerships for the benefit of these countries. The objective will be pursued through promotional activities for investment and technology transfer opportunities, as well as through training and capacity building of institutional partners in Korea and in developing countries.
